page.text: Education
Graduated John Brown University December 2014
Bachelor of Science: Graphic and Web Design & Fine Art and Illustration
Work
Graphic Design Intern at Fleishman Hillard
Summer 2014. Working on the Creative Team to develop digital and sometimes print
solutions for clients such as Chevrolet, Google, and Michaels.
Student Ministries Leadership Team
Director of Campus Ministries, Fall 2013 & Spring 2014. Planned small group events
and coordinated with the other members of the Campus Ministries Team.
Lab Technician for Printmaking Studio at John Brown University
Fall 2013 & Fall 2014. Assisted in teaching students printmaking techniques and
operated printmaking lab times.
Graphic Design Intern at TPSi Tulsa
Summer 2013. Designed print samples for HP Indigo series and revised client work.
Visual Art Foundry Cabinet
Leader Fine Art & Illustration Fall 2012 & Spring 2013. Planned student led events to
encourage the art community at JBU.
Graphic Design Volunteer at The Pointe
Summer 2012. Designed signage, bulletins, and event posters.
Skills
Proficient in Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, and Photoshop
Experience with Muse & After Effects
Two Years Experience executing & teaching in Screenprinting & Printmaking
Accolades
Fine Artist of the Year 2014
John Brown University Artie Awards
Struggle: A Senior Fine Art Exhibit
Personal Gallery Show of Printmaking and Fine Art pieces.
First Place Fine Art
John Brown University Student Works Show 2013
Third Place Printmaking
John Brown University Student Works Show 2013
